text:
Hi there!
This is great! Is there any prerequisite for this to work?
On our dev account, neither the old nor newly creates JS-files get minified on published sites (no domain connected) :thinking_face:
so just to confirm, we have to go through all of our clients to copy/paste the scripts, save as new JS files, and then attach those new files for the JS minifier to work, correct?
Yes, the reason this was done was to avoid potentially breaking existing scripts. The old minifier is still being used on the old scripts. So its not like no minification vs minification.
<@UHDEVB0S1> If you send me the example I can see why it isnâ€™t being minified
